tool_description: Creates new user profiles with basic information and initial settings for streaming platform accounts.

date_of_birth.description: User's birth date for age verification and content filtering

language_preference.description: Preferred language code (e.g., en, es, fr)

error_messages: Profile name already exists: Choose a different profile name for this account.
Invalid date format: Provide date_of_birth in valid date-time format.
Account not found: The specified account_id does not exist.
Language not supported: Use a supported language code.
Profile limit reached: Maximum number of profiles per account exceeded.
usage: Provide account_id, profile_name, and date_of_birth to create a new profile. Optionally set language_preference and parental_controls.

profile_id.description: Unique identifier for the created profile

assigned_avatar.description: Default avatar assigned to the profile
